verses.text: Aton yab'ixal eb' yinhtilal vinhaj Adán tic d'a stzolal. Ayic ix b'oji eb' anima yuj Dios, icha Dios ix aj eb'.
Ix b'oji vinh vinac yed' pax ix ix, ix yak'anpax svach'k'olal d'a yib'anh eb'. Atax d'a jun k'u chi' ayic ix b'ojiel eb' yuuj, anima ix sb'iejcan eb' yuuj.
A vinhaj Adán chi', 130 ab'il sq'uinal vinh ayic ix alji junxo yuninal vinh scuchan Set, lajan ix aj yed' smam chi'.
Ix lajvi chi', 800 ab'ilto ix yil vinhaj Adán chi'. Ayto yuninal vinh yed' yisil vinh ix alji.
930 ab'il ix yil vinh, ix cham vinh b'ian.
A vinhaj Set chi', 105 ab'il sq'uinal vinh ayic ix alji jun yuninal vinh scuchan Enós.
Ix lajvi chi', 807 ab'ilto ix yil vinh, ayto yuninal vinh yed' yisil vinh ix alji.
912 ab'il ix yil vinh, ix cham vinh b'ian.
A vinhaj Enós chi', 90 ab'il sq'uinal vinh ayic ix alji jun yuninal vinh scuchan Cainán.
Ix lajvi chi', 815 ab'ilto ix yil vinh, ayto yuninal vinh yed' yisil vinh ix alji.
905 ab'il ix yil vinh, ix cham vinh b'ian.
A vinhaj Cainán chi', 70 ab'il sq'uinal vinh ayic ix alji jun yuninal vinh scuchan Mahalalel.
Ix lajvi chi', 840 ab'ilto ix yil vinh, ayto yuninal vinh yed' yisil vinh ix alji.
910 ab'il ix yil vinh, ix cham vinh b'ian.
A vinhaj Mahalalel chi', 65 ab'il sq'uinal vinh ayic ix alji jun yuninal vinh scuchan Jared.
Ix lajvi chi', 830 ab'ilto ix yil vinh, ayto yuninal vinh yed' yisil vinh ix alji.
895 ab'il ix yil vinh, ix cham vinh b'ian.
A vinhaj Jared chi', 162 ab'il sq'uinal vinh ayic ix alji jun yuninal vinh scuchan Enoc.
Ix lajvi chi', 800 ab'ilto ix yil vinh, ayto yuninal vinh yed' yisil vinh ix alji.
962 ab'il ix yil vinh, ix cham vinh b'ian.
A vinhaj Enoc chi', 65 ab'il sq'uinal vinh ayic ix alji jun yuninal vinh scuchan Matusalén.
Yictax ix alji yuninal vinh chi', 300 ab'il ix sk'anab'ajej Dios vinh. D'a jun tiempoal chi', ayto yuninal vinh yed' yisil vinh ix alji.
365 ab'il ix yil vinh.
Ix sb'eyb'alej val vinh icha sgana Dios, yuj chi' ay jun k'u ix satem vinh, yujto a Dios ix ik'anb'at vinh yed'oc.
A vinhaj Matusalén chi', 187 ab'il sq'uinal vinh ayic ix alji jun yuninal vinh scuchan Lamec.
Ix lajvi chi' 782 ab'ilto ix yil vinh, ayto yuninal vinh yed' yisil vinh ix alji.
969 ab'il ix yil vinh, ix cham vinh b'ian.
A vinhaj Lamec chi', 182 ab'il sq'uinal vinh ayic ix alji jun yuninal vinh.
Noé ix sb'iej yuj vinh yujto ix yal vinh: A Jehová ix catab'an lum luum tic, yuj chi' te ya co munlaj d'a sat luum, palta a vinh unin tic ol ak'an snivanil co k'ool, xchi vinhaj Lamec chi'.
Ayic toxo ix alji vinhaj Noé chi', 595 ab'ilto ix yil vinhaj Lamec chi', ayto yuninal vinh yed' yisil vinh ix alji.
777 ab'il ix yil vinh, ix cham vinh b'ian.
A vinhaj Noé chi', 500 ab'il sq'uinal vinh ayic ix syamanoch yalji eb' yuninal vinh, aton vinhaj Sem, vinhaj Cam yed' vinhaj Jafet.
